description: Returns detailed status for each member account within an organization for a given organization Config rule.

parameters.name: OrganizationConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The name of your organization Config rule for which you want status details for member accounts.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A StatusDetailFilters object. AccountId (string) --- The 12-digit account ID of the member account within an organization. MemberAccountRuleStatus (string) --- Indicates deployment status for Config rule in the member account. When management account calls PutOrganizationConfigRule action for the first time, Config rule status is created in the member account. When management account calls PutOrganizationConfigRule action for the second time, Config rule status is updated in the member account. Config rule status is deleted when the management account deletes OrganizationConfigRule and disables service access for config-multiaccountsetup.amazonaws.com. Config sets the state of the rule to: CREATE_SUCCESSFUL when Config rule has been created in the member account. CREATE_IN_PROGRESS when Config rule is being created in the member account. CREATE_FAILED when Config rule creation has failed in the member account. DELETE_FAILED when Config rule deletion has failed in the member account. DELETE_IN_PROGRESS when Config rule is being deleted in the member account. DELETE_SUCCESSFUL when Config rule has been deleted in the member account. UPDATE_SUCCESSFUL when Config rule has been updated in the member account. UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS when Config rule is being updated in the member account. UPDATE_FAILED when Config rule deletion has failed in the member account.

nested_params.name: AccountId
nested_params.description: The 12-digit account ID of the member account within an organization.

nested_params.name: MemberAccountRuleStatus
nested_params.description: Indicates deployment status for Config rule in the member account. When management account calls PutOrganizationConfigRule action for the first time, Config rule status is created in the member account. When management account calls PutOrganizationConfigRule action for the second time, Config rule status is updated in the member account. Config rule status is deleted when the management account deletes OrganizationConfigRule and disables service access for config-multiaccountsetup.amazonaws.com. Config sets the state of the rule to:

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account ID of a member account.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of Config rule deployed in the member account.

nested_items.name: MemberAccountRuleStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates deployment status for Config rule in the member account. When management account calls PutOrganizationConfigRule action for the first time, Config rule status is created in the member account. When management account calls PutOrganizationConfigRule action for the second time, Config rule status is updated in the member account. Config rule status is deleted when the management account deletes OrganizationConfigRule and disables service access for config-multiaccountsetup.amazonaws.com.
CREATE_SUCCESSFUL when Config rule has been created in the member account.
CREATE_IN_PROGRESS when Config rule is being created in the member account.
CREATE_FAILED when Config rule creation has failed in the member account.
DELETE_FAILED when Config rule deletion has failed in the member account.
DELETE_IN_PROGRESS when Config rule is being deleted in the member account.
DELETE_SUCCESSFUL when Config rule has been deleted in the member account.
UPDATE_SUCCESSFUL when Config rule has been updated in the member account.
UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS when Config rule is being updated in the member account.
UPDATE_FAILED when Config rule deletion has failed in the member account.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: An error code that is returned when Config rule creation or deletion failed in the member account.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message indicating that Config rule account creation or deletion has failed due to an error in the member account.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last status update.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
